streamstemplate:
streams template for datm in CCSM4
!----------------------------------------------------------------------------->
Stream description file for Qian et. al. 2006 solar data
CLMNCEP
time time xc lon yc lat area area mask mask
$DIN_LOC_ROOT/atm/datm7
domain.T62.050609.nc
FSDS swdn
$DIN_LOC_ROOT/atm/datm7/atm_forcing.datm7.Qian.T62.c080727/Solar6Hrly
coszen
0
clmforc.Qian.c2006.T62.Solr.%ym.nc
Stream description file for Qian et. al. 2006 precipitation data
CLMNCEP
time time xc lon yc lat area area mask mask
$DIN_LOC_ROOT/atm/datm7
domain.T62.050609.nc
PRECTmms precn
$DIN_LOC_ROOT/atm/datm7/atm_forcing.datm7.Qian.T62.c080727/Precip6Hrly
nearest
0
clmforc.Qian.c2006.T62.Prec.%ym.nc
Stream description file for Qian et. al. 2006 temperature, pressure, humidity and wind data
CLMNCEP
time time xc lon yc lat area area mask mask
$DIN_LOC_ROOT/atm/datm7
domain.T62.050609.nc
TBOT tbot WIND wind QBOT shum PSRF pbot
$DIN_LOC_ROOT/atm/datm7/atm_forcing.datm7.Qian.T62.c080727/TmpPrsHumWnd3Hrly
linear
0
clmforc.Qian.c2006.T62.TPQW.%ym.nc

coszen
0

$DIN_LOC_ROOT/share/domains/domain.clm
domain.lnd.360x720_cruncep.100429.nc
TBOT tbot WIND wind QBOT shum PSRF pbot FLDS lwdn

linear

clmforc.cruncep.V4.c2011.0.5d.TPQWL.%ym.nc
Stream description file for atmospheric forcing from single point datasets
CLMNCEP
time time xc lon yc lat area area mask mask
$DIN_LOC_ROOT/atm/datm7/domain.clm
%do
domain.lnd.1x1pt-mexicocityMEX_navy.090715.nc
domain.lnd.1x1pt-vancouverCAN_navy.090715.nc
domain.lnd.1x1pt-urbanc_alpha_navy.090715.nc
ZBOT z TBOT tbot RH rh WIND wind PRECTmms precn FSDS swdn PSRF pbot FLDS lwdn
ZBOT z TBOT tbot RH rh WIND wind PRECTmms precn FSDS swdn FSDSdir swdndr FSDSdif swdndf PSRF pbot FLDS lwdn
ZBOT z TBOT tbot RH rh WIND wind PRECTmms precn FSDS swdn FSDSdir swdndr FSDSdif swdndf PSRF pbot FLDS lwdn
ZBOT z TBOT tbot QBOT shum WIND wind PRECTmms precn FSDS swdn FSDSdir swdndr FSDSdif swdndf PSRF pbot FLDS lwdn
$DIN_LOC_ROOT/atm/datm7/CLM1PT_data/%c
$DIN_LOC_ROOT/atm/datm7/CLM1PT_data/mexicocityMEX.c080124
$DIN_LOC_ROOT/atm/datm7/CLM1PT_data/vancouverCAN.c080124
$DIN_LOC_ROOT/atm/datm7/CLM1PT_data/urbanc_alpha.c080416
%ym.nc
clm1pt-1993-12.nc
clm1pt-1992-08.nc
clm1pt-0001-08.nc clm1pt-0001-09.nc clm1pt-0001-10.nc clm1pt-0001-11.nc clm1pt-0001-12.nc clm1pt-0002-01.nc clm1pt-0002-02.nc clm1pt-0002-03.nc clm1pt-0002-04.nc clm1pt-0002-05.nc clm1pt-0002-06.nc clm1pt-0002-07.nc clm1pt-0002-08.nc clm1pt-0002-09.nc clm1pt-0002-10.nc clm1pt-0002-11.nc
Stream description file for CPL history 3-hourly Precip data at 0.9x1.25 resolution for BGC spinup
CPL
time time xc lon yc lat area area mask mask
$DIN_LOC_ROOT/atm/datm7
domain.lnd.fv0.9x1.25_gx1v6.090309.nc
a2x3h_Faxa_rainc rainc a2x3h_Faxa_rainl rainl a2x3h_Faxa_snowc snowc a2x3h_Faxa_snowl snowl
%p/CMIP5/CCSM/csm/%c/cpl/hist
nearest
-5400
%c.cpl.ha2x3h.%ym.nc
Stream description file for CPL history 3-hourly non-Precipitation and non-Solar data at 0.9x1.25 resolution for BGC spinup
CPL
time time xc lon yc lat area area mask mask
$DIN_LOC_ROOT/atm/datm7
domain.lnd.fv0.9x1.25_gx1v6.090309.nc
a2x3h_Sa_z z a2x3h_Sa_u u a2x3h_Sa_v v a2x3h_Sa_tbot tbot a2x3h_Sa_ptem ptem a2x3h_Sa_shum shum a2x3h_Sa_pbot pbot a2x3h_Faxa_lwdn lwdn a2x3h_Sa_dens dens a2x3h_Sa_pslv pslv
%p/CMIP5/CCSM/csm/%c/cpl/hist
linear
-5400
%c.cpl.ha2x3h.%ym.nc
Stream description file for CPL history 3-hourly Solar data at 0.9x1.25 resolution for BGC spinup
CPL
time time xc lon yc lat area area mask mask
$DIN_LOC_ROOT/atm/datm7
domain.lnd.fv0.9x1.25_gx1v6.090309.nc
a2x3h_Faxa_swndr swndr a2x3h_Faxa_swvdr swvdr a2x3h_Faxa_swndf swndf a2x3h_Faxa_swvdf swvdf
%p/CMIP5/CCSM/csm/%c/cpl/hist
coszen
-10800
%c.cpl.ha2x3h.%ym.nc
Stream description file for aerosol deposition
presaero
time time lon lon lat lat area area mask mask
%dp
%do
BCDEPWET bcphiwet BCPHODRY bcphodry BCPHIDRY bcphidry OCDEPWET ocphiwet OCPHIDRY ocphidry OCPHODRY ocphodry DSTX01WD dstwet1 DSTX01DD dstdry1 DSTX02WD dstwet2 DSTX02DD dstdry2 DSTX03WD dstwet3 DSTX03DD dstdry3 DSTX04WD dstwet4 DSTX04DD dstdry4
%p
0
%c
